title: Laser-targeted removal of prostate tumors works as well complete removal of prostate

title_detail.value: Laser-targeted removal of prostate tumors works as well complete removal of prostate

summary: Researchers have shown that selectively destroying cancerous prostate tissue is as effective as complete prostate removal or radiation therapy while preserving more sexual and urinary function than the other treatments.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have shown that selectively destroying cancerous prostate tissue is as effective as complete prostate removal or radiation therapy while preserving more sexual and urinary function than the other treatments.
